description.p: A moderate magical force slows time around a Medium or smaller creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the end of the turn.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect creatures of one size larger than Medium for each slot above 1st.

setters.set: 1 reaction, which you take when you see a creature within range move willingly
